Articles.Content: If you're thinking about getting into the game check my review out.

This guy sounds like he should be the DJ at an all night smooth jazz station or something.

Video was also good, explains the game in broad strokes while recommending it wholeheartedly.

If I had watched this prior to learning more about KSP I would'ave bought it sooner. 10/10

"...and now it's time to slow things right down as we head toward the witching hour. Here's Weeping Piles Laugherty with 'Smooth Evacuator'..." 

Edited February 14, 2016 by Foxster

*Kerbin

The video mistook the planet Kerbin for Kerbal, the species, or possibly Kerbol, the name of the star and the solar system, (Although that name was redacted at some point in the game, but at one point the game did call it Kerbol, so that is the best name we have for it).

I also found it funny how at first when you said your hour count, I felt like you were saying you had alot, but my reaction was 'That's it?' and then I had you yourself say that wasn't much. I bet alot of players would have thought that that was alot xD

Edited February 14, 2016 by nosirrbro
